steps.name: Log in to the prolinker staging
Open sector selection for the 1 field
Open sector selection for the 2 field
Verify that the user is logged in

Enter description of yourself : Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. Verify that the alert about successful invite is displayed
Check the AQA-CI-KSnFD-1233-U-qLtOs's invitation card in the outgoing section

Verify that the email message is correct
